info.title: Navigate to menu item in menubar in reading mode

user: Navigate to 'Text Formatting' menu with down arrow
instructions.raw: Navigate to 'Text Formatting' menu with down arrow| Navigate to 'Style/Color' menu
instructions.mode: Verify the Virtual Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn on the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

assertions.expectation: Availability of a submenu is conveyed
The position of the item and number of items in the menubar are conveyed
Closed state of the submenu is conveyed
